Yeah, well. Pretty hard to sift the truth from the polemic. Good to see another side of the story. Sadly, most of it is just the story of a disgruntled evangelist seeking to aggrandise herself. If the video is more or less truthful then yeah, some of it is disturbing. But a lot if it is just shooting the messenger. And a lot of it applies obvous double standards and poor logic regarding cause & consequence.
